the level from DPH's set.

got a soldier through it on slaughter. i had already taken the soldie 
through the first 50ish, the Tevildo, ten of mine, and DPH's first 
three. after cheating pretty blatantly along the way with golems and 
whatnot, i had ~level 323 and 2000 in each stat.

so! i get through the level, kill everything, i'm in the top right 
corner, and the game slows down a little. i figure, no biggy, get to 
the exit, and go in. i get the exit to yadda yadda message, and 
hit "y". i then get the Congratulations message without the 
congratulations graphic telling me i got level 982. i figure, nifty! 
then the game crashes, granular page limits and whatnot. now the game 
won't work! what's up with that?! i try to start it and all i get is 
the forgotten sages screen, then nothing.

suggestions?

Oldschool
